sentences.english: Arthroscopic surgery is anew technique for orthopaedic.

sentences.english: Objective To investigate the application of preoperative hemodilution autohemotransfusion in orthopedic operation.

sentences.english: Orthotics are orthopedic devices that are used to treat a variety of biomechanical foot disorders.
